rukus.text: 104|1|Durbhoga pratyeka se'i byaktira babe yiye sanmukhata arau anupasthitita paraninda karae.
104|2|Yiye sampada jama karae arau barae barae ganana karae.
104|3|Si dharana karae ye, tara sampade taka cirajirai karai raakhiba.
104|4|Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya si hutamata niksipta haâ€™ba.
